X.v.1.D.7.c
.
Requesting Corroborative Evidence
If the claimant identified sources of information or evidence while testifying that corroborates the claim,
attempt to obtain the additional evidence, and
do
not
issue a decision on the claim until development has been completed.
Example
:  The claimant reports treatment from Dr. John Smith, and Dr. Smith’s report is not in the claims folder.  Reasonable efforts must be made to obtain that report before issuing a decision.
